question: Which state's education department has launched the Shala Siddhi Karyakram and Shala Siddhi Prohatsan Puraskar Yojana to provide qualitative education to 25000 students of government school?
explanation: Madhya Pradesh government launched the Shala Siddhi Karyakram and Shala Siddhi Prohatsan Puraskar Yojana to provide qualitative education to 25000 students of government school. A time table has been fixed for the award process. According to the time table, selection committees at block level will be formed by the district core committees till July 22. The selected schools will forward their applications for Shala Siddhi Karyakram to Sankul Principals till July 28.
